newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Dec 9.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Dec 9.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Ivorian Foreign Minister Amara Essy enters race for next U.N. secretary-general
- How Ivory Coast marked Saturday's third anniversary of the death of independence president Felix Houphouet-Boigny.
- China organises EXPO CHINE '96 trade fair in Abidjan from December 12-18; nine Chinese towns and provinces represented, six national import-export companies (Advertisement).

- Cocoa and coffee company Sicc gets 40 billion CFA loan from Dresner Bank Luxembourg SA to fund purchases as part of the 1996/97 marketing system and expand its processing capacity, says Sicc chairman and managing director Daniel Usher.
- Coffee bought from peasants around western town of Man for 300 CFA francs against official guide price of 500 CFA, regional development official tells authorities
